What were they thinking?

Ever since Adam snacked on the forbidden fruit and was chased naked out of the Garden of Eden, mankind has bitten off a bevy of bad ideas.

From skinny-dipping Presidents to toxic tooth fillings to singing pop stars who can't carry a tune, 100 of the Worst Ideas in History is a celebration of humanity's historicalÃ¢â‚¬â€and often hystericalÃ¢â‚¬â€missteps that have started wars, sunk countries, wrecked companies, scuttled careers, lost millions, and even endangered the Earth.

Discover:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ How a confused chauffeur helped start World War I

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Who turned down the greatest product placement opportunity in Hollywood history

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The toad that nearly ate Australia

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The most dangerous children's game ever invented

Spanning politics, pop culture, fashion, sports, technology, and more, this irreverent and witty book is packed with fun photos and sidebars, tracing how these thundering brainstorms turned into blundering brain fartsÃ¢â‚¬â€and the astonishing impacts our faux pas and foibles still have on us today.
